description:
Himari loses consciousness as Kamba leaves her, and is taken to East Kamome Hospital. When Shouma finds out he rushes to the hospital and is told by the doctor that Himari was mumbling Kamba`s name all the way to the hospital.
Kamba on the other hand is given the chance to see Sanetoshi`s power for himself, and thus starts obeying him to the letter, as he is confident that Sanetoshi can save Himari. But according to the doctor at the hospital, Himari only has a few hours left to live...
Source: Official Site
